plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                       For the First Circuit


No. 04-1027

                        M & K WELDING, INC.,

                       Plaintiff, Appellant,

                                 v.

                       LEASING PARTNERS, LLC,

                        Defendant, Appellee.


                               ERRATA


     The opinion of the court issued on October 22, 2004, is
amended as follows:

     Page 5, line 4:   change "M & K" to "Leasing Partners"
